price: Akasema: Enyi wahishimiwa! Nipeni shauri katika jambo langu hili, kwani mimi sikati shauri yoyote mpaka mhudhurie.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ
footnotes: Akaiambia baraza ya washauri wake: Nibainishieni lifaalo katika haya mambo muhimu nilio wekewa mbele yangu. Kwani mimi sikati shauri juu ya jambo lolote mpaka muwe nyinyi mmehudhuria.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
